      class  Block
      The Block class represents a block in a blockchain.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Finds the parent of a Block b.
      Methods in cmg.cnsim.bitcoin with parameters of type ITxContainer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BitcoinNode.event_NodeCompletesValidation(ITxContainer t, long time)
      Handles the event when a node completes block validation (i.e., solves the hashcash problem.
      void BitcoinNode.event_NodeReceivesPropagatedContainer(ITxContainer t)
      Handles the event when a node receives a propagated container (i.e., a block validated by some other miner).

      Methods in cmg.cnsim.engine.node with parameters of type ITxContainer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Node.event_NodeCompletesValidation(ITxContainer t, long time)
      See INode.event_NodeCompletesValidation(ITxContainer, long) TODO: prospectiveMiningCycles must be removed from here, they are inaccurate, in cases of cancellation.
      void INode.event_NodeCompletesValidation(ITxContainer t, long time)
      Event: Node completes validation of a container.
      void INode.event_NodeReceivesPropagatedContainer(ITxContainer t)

      void Node.propagateContainer(ITxContainer txc, long time)
      Propagates the specified transaction container to other nodes in the simulation.
      void Node.removeFromPool(ITxContainer removeThese)
      Removes the transactions included in transaction container from the pool.
      long Node.scheduleValidationEvent(ITxContainer txc, long time)
      Schedules a validation event for the specified transaction container at the given time.
